properties.name: hangout.allowed-origins.url
properties.description: Comma seperated values of the frontend urls that we should allow

properties.name: minio.url
properties.description: Address to the server of the Minio/S3 service

properties.name: minio.accessKey
properties.description: Access Key to be used to authenticate with Minio/S3 service

properties.name: minio.secretKey
properties.description: Secret Key to be used to authenticate with Minio/S3 service

properties.name: hangout.media.upload-bucket
properties.description: The Minio/S3 bucket in which we will place the uploaded multimedia files for further processing

properties.name: hangout.auth-service.url
properties.description: URL of auth service to authorize access tokens

properties.name: hangout.kafka.content.topic
properties.description: The kafka topic to produce event in, to indicate new multimedia content is available for processing
